com.jenjinstudios.io.serialization

Class GsonMessageWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jenjinstudios.io.serialization.GsonMessageWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageWriter

    public class GsonMessageWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageWriter
    Implements a MessageWriter which relies on Gson to serialize outgoing data.
